original_text: King Solomon was greater in riches and wisdom than all the other kings of the earth.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕의 재산과 지혜가 천하의 모든 왕들보다 큰지라

sentences.original_text: King Solomon was greater in riches and wisdom
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕은 재물과 지혜에서 더 뛰어났으며

sentences.original_text: than all the other kings of the earth
